text: Heartbreaking news as Russia continues its relentless assault on Ukraine's critical infrastructure. My thoughts are with the brave people of Ukraine who face these devastating attacks daily. It's crucial that the international community stands firmly behind Ukraine, providing necessary military aid to protect their sovereignty and preserve regional stability.
